title: Readout of the President’s Call with Cleveland Cavaliers’ Coach Lue | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
June 23, 2016

 



Readout of the President’s Call with Cleveland Cavaliers’ Coach Lue





	This afternoon, the President called Cleveland Cavaliers head coach Tyronn Lue to congratulate him and his team on winning the NBA finals. On the call, the President praised the Cavaliers’ tireless work and relentless determination in what was an impressive victory for the team and their MVP, LeBron James. The President invited the team to the White House to celebrate their championship win.
